entries.sui_prompt2: Experience to learn from this item?
entries.sui_prompt1:
You must spend experience points in order to learn from this item.

Do you really want to spend
entries.msg_learned_command: You have learned a new ability!
entries.msg_learned_schematic: You have learned a new draft schematic!
entries.msg_already_have_command: You already have that ability. You cannot learn from this item.
entries.msg_already_have_schematic: You already have that draft schematic. You cannot learn from this item.
entries.msg_not_enough_xp: You do not have enough experience to learn from this item. You need at least %DI %TO experience.
entries.msg_no_xp: You cannot learn from this item. You do not have any %TO experience.
entries.msg_no_min_skill: You do not meet the minimum skill requirements to learn from this item. You must have the %TO skill.
